sources.name: DataSetB
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DataSetB

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DataSetB = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://storaged2d2.blob.core.windows.net/capstone4roman/DatasetB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQueryB = let
  Source = DataSetB,
  #"Capitalized each word" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"marital_status", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}}),
  #"Capitalized each word 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Capitalized each word", {{"disease", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}})
in
  #"Capitalized each word 1";
